heroSection.title: Get in touch
heroSection.description: Having a question about our robotics solutions or want to explore partnership opportunities? We're here to help. Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

officeAddress.en: Nagoya University Incubation Facility, Furo-cho, Chikusa Ward, Nagoya, Aichi 464-0814, Japan

seo.metaTitle: Contact Us - Fainzy Technologies | Get in Touch
seo.metaDescription: Contact Fainzy Technologies for inquiries about our robotics solutions, partnership opportunities, or career questions. Located in Nagoya, Japan.
